title: Belleza
description: Mya Peters is troubled, broken and she found herself in a place nightmares are made of. What was supposed to be a happy trip to London to visit her brother, turned into a tragedy and she was plunged into a world like no other. Her saviour, confident and friend Trixie, helped her find her feet after she was disowned by her parents. They had decided that the family tragedy was all her fault, and they left her to live her life alone. Mya soon decided that she could not longer live the life she was living, enough was enough and she decided to take a hold of her life and better herself. Joe Green is a handsome, small business owner is trying to rebuild his life after a divorce. His trust in women is on a short fuse, but the fireworks soon start to explode when he runs into Mya on two separate occasions. Two chance encounters, and Joe is fascinated by Mya and he needs to know more. Mya and Joe both have issues, and with Mya’s dark past threatening to collide with her future she is struggling to keep her head above water. Dark secrets, violent history and a sad tale of betrayal and heartbreak. Do these two sincere and genuine people really stand a chance? Does everyone deserve a second chance? Will mysteries and secrets be revealed? There’s only one way to find out. *** PLEASE BE AWARE THAT THIS STORY CONTAINS STRONG SEXUAL SCENES, A LITTLE VIOLENCE AND SUSPENSE ~ SUITABLE FOR READERS OVER THE AGE OF 18 ONLY ***
author: J.A. Heron
